amendment.description: To require the FAA to complete a study and report regarding the feasibility of consolidating the Anchorage Terminal Radar Approach Control and the Anchorage Air Route Traffic Control Center.

vote.text: Amendment SA 907 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 907 proposed by Senator Murkowski. (consideration: CR S7813-7814; text: CR S7813) To require the FAA to complete a study and report regarding the feasibility of consolidating the Anchorage Terminal Radar Approach Control and the Anchorage Air Route Traffic Control Center.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 907 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 907 proposed by Senator Murkowski.
